section.title: Creating RSV
section.p: Create the OOBPolicyRSV in draft state which can be used for all the policy use cases.

To do this, log in to the SM GUI and navigate to Policy & Charging and select Policy tab. Select Rules and Variables from the drop-down list. Click to create a policy RSV as shown in the following figure:

note.p: Change the state to RELEASE for distributing the rules to ME.
